quote.text: If they shot the cameras, they already know enough

messages.text: I understood it was a cyber attack
Is that confirmed, or is it a rumor?
That's what they said at my command center
All the cameras went down and then at some point they came back up and they saw masses of Arabs breaking into Israeli territory and they couldn't manage to notify people
The question is whether you can know for sure this can't happen at your post
Why couldn't they notify people? Because they didn't have time?
